College Football Mapping for Play Stats Types

cfb_play_stats_types.Rd

This function identifies all play stats types identified in the play by play data. This can be used to filter out play stats types when calling functions before hand.

cfb_play_stats_types()

Format

A data frame with 22 rows and 2 variables:

id

Referencing play id

name

Type of play stats

...

Examples


cfb_play_stats_types()
#>    id                name
#> 1   1        Incompletion
#> 2   2              Target
#> 3   3        Pass Breakup
#> 4   4          Completion
#> 5   5           Reception
#> 6   6              Tackle
#> 7   7                Rush
#> 8   8              Fumble
#> 9   9       Fumble Forced
#> 10 10    Fumble Recovered
#> 11 11          Sack Taken
#> 12 12                Sack
#> 13 13             Kickoff
#> 14 14         Onside Kick
#> 15 15      Kickoff Return
#> 16 16                Punt
#> 17 17          Punt Block
#> 18 18  FG Attempt Blocked
#> 19 19    Field Goal Block
#> 20 20 Interception Thrown
#> 21 21        Interception
#> 22 22           Touchdown
